game.name: The Reflex Lab
game.shortDescription: You've been kidnapped by an evil (and extremely rude) alien. To escape, you’ll have to complete a series of reflex, skill and patience based trials in his poorly constructed laboratory. Will you survive the alien’s twisted tests and escape? Or will you end up like his last batch of “lab rats”?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You've been kidnapped by an evil (and extremely rude) alien. To escape, you’ll have to complete a series of reflex, skill and patience based trials in his poorly constructed laboratory. Will you survive the alien’s twisted tests and escape? Or will you end up like his last batch of “lab rats”?
